verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-kathā śunibāre mora icchā haya
kṛṣṇa-kathā kaha more hañā sadaya"

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-kathā—discussions on the subject of Lord Kṛṣṇa; śunibāre—to hear; mora—my; icchā—desire; haya—is; kṛṣṇa-kathā—talks about Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa; kaha—kindly speak; more—unto me; hañā—being; sa-daya—kind.
translation: "I wish to hear topics concerning Lord Kṛṣṇa constantly. Be merciful unto me and kindly tell me something about Kṛṣṇa."
